short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables users to easily obtain verification codes for two-factor authentication.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser plugin's main function is to provide users with a unified way of managing 2FA keys for different websites. It allows users to easily obtain 2FA verification codes without having to switch back and forth between multiple websites. 
Additionally, the plugin also provides multiple backup options, allowing users to safely store their 2FA keys to prevent loss or forgetting. This plugin brings more convenience and security to users and is a very useful tool.

If you encounter any problems during use, please don't panic. Negative reviews cannot solve the problem. You can provide feedback via the link below and I will follow up promptly.
ğŸ‘‰ https://logspot.hocgin.top/addone-otp?active=feedback ğŸ‘ˆ

If this has been helpful to you, can you please give me a good review? ğŸŒ¹
